Leading Call Center Services Provider

For over 15 years, Mass Markets has provided Call Center Services for some of the largest and most recognizable brands in the world. Customer experience and brand care experts, clients count on Mass Markets to produce anything from new leads to inbound customer service and outbound sales. Mass Markets is a tech-enabled call center service provider that delivers innovative business process outsourcing solutions, infrastructure, and top customer-facing talent.

“Mass Markets’ goal is to challenge the status quo. The bottom line is that we can help clients move faster, grow larger and solve more problems with substantially more efficiency using our Anything-as-a-Service (XaaS) platform.” – Marlowe | CEO

Partner with Mass Markets for Inbound Customer Service and Outbound Sales. Top provider of outsourced call center services across the customer account lifecycle. For serious Business Inquiries, please click here to Contact Us.

Inbound Services

With a proven track record of delivering Inbound Call Center results on a variety of projects including scaled, multi-site B2C customer care, complex B2B customer service selling, and 24/7 technical support.  Mass Markets inbound experience spans multiple industries and includes multiple high profile clients with demanding service level and seasonal staffing requirements.  Every inbound project and customer is unique. Mass Markets develops custom solutions for clients that consistently achieved leading results.

INBOUND

OUTBOUND SERVICES

Mass Markets is a proven leader in business and consumer outbound projects. Mass Markets offers a comprehensive array of outbound customer contact center services. Utilizing sophisticated database management, technology, and an elevated multi-touch/multi-channel approach, Mass Markets fields an outbound solution that is genuine, unique and highly effective. 

OUTBOUND

Omnichannel

Complementing our core service offerings are a host of technology, software and development capabilities, providing our customers with the flexibility to customize and integrate in order to meet reporting, workflow and enterprise contact center functionality requirements unique to our business. Gain performance and financial efficiency through the use of our blended voice and digital customer contact center omnichannel solutions..

Digital

CUT YOUR COSTS

BUSINESS PROCESS OUTSOURCING EXCELLENCE

Mass Markets is your secret weapon to making more money. We deploy experienced call center agents who specialize in negotiation, trouble shooting and much more. For serious Business Enquiries, Contact Us.

TECH-ENABLED

BUSINESS-TO-BUSINESS

The B2B interaction is a Mass Markets specialty. We have embraced the fact that business sales, lead generation, and even service-oriented interactions require specialized infrastructure, talent, training, tools and technology.

B2B

BUSINESS-TO-CUSTOMER

Our B2C solutions are designed to ensure interactions achieve best-in-class customer experience and performance. Customer programs are fully supported through technology, back-office and demand generation strategies.

B2C

People-Powered

BECOME A PARTNER

We customize solutions to your business, your customers and we have a reputation for being the best-in-class when it comes to critical customer touch points. We are experts in complex customer service, tech-support, retention and customer relationship management, acting as an extension of your brand while providing innovative solutions that drive customer experience and efficiency.

STRATEGIC LOCATIONS

Sign Me Up

Mass Markets, an MCI Company, is an industry leader in advanced, tech-enabled B2B and B2C contact center telesales, customer care and omni-channel digital services. With a culture built on delivering superior levels of performance, we are committed to praiseworthy customer interactions that create value for our clients. Since 2003, Mass Markets has delivered, high-impact, agile, scalable, and compliant business process outsourcing solutions while proficiently solving complex people, process and technology challenges.
